landingData.about: I am a computer science graduate student at The University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign with a passion for software development. I am curious by nature and have wide interests in CS that I translate them into projects. I am looking for SDE Intern roles at the moment for Summer 2023.

work.aboutWork: End to end truck weigh bridge software solution for trucks and heavy motor vehicles. Worked with a team of 3 on Django, SQL and Web frontend for a desktop application for a heavy mortar vehicle weigh bridge (truck scale) in Erode.

- Worked on Opensource CCTV Solution: Shinobi to use custom Tensorflow Models as Plugins
- HTML/CSS Web pages creation and react integration
- Tech Used: Bootstrap4 layout, CSS, SCSS, ReactJS, NodeJS

Was responsible for researching and creating technology related content. Explored content-based and web search engine optimization techniques. Reviewed popular cloud IaaS services, their tools, reports and software.

work.organization: The Hindu Education Plus Club VIT
work.aboutWork: Was Media/Tech Lead for the journalistic literature student club that was created by India's largest print daily. Organized multiple collaborative events with other student chapters. Moved the club's campus newsletter segment online where members/editor can write, review, edit and publish content.
Taught 10th grade English to kids from Kasam Home, Vellore to help refurnish their language fundamentals and to equip them to take on secondary school board examinations.

projects.title: IDunno: A Distributed ML Inference System
projects.description: A ML inference system build on top of 10 VMs from scratch - includes a distributed group membership protocol, a simple DFS and a work scheduling algorithm to optimize query rate.

projects.title: WildSprint
projects.description: A fundraising platform that allows for donations via ether powered by Ethereum smart contracts. Dyte SDK used to live stream animals in their habitats to raise awareness.

projects.title: Map Reduce Simulation
projects.description: Simulated the Map Reduce Algorithm used in HPC in cloud infrastructures on a smaller scale with docker instances functioning as nodes in a distributed system with Python.

projects.title: Yarn Traders Application
projects.description: Most small/medium scale yarn trading companies around Erode, TN (prominent textile business zone) lack any kind of technological means to gain business insight. This MERN Stack application works as a website/catalogue and receives business inquiries for products. This data is used to create a bunch of visualizations that have semantic value to yarn traders and provide marketing and business insight.

projects.title: The Weekly Edge Application
projects.description: A full scale web application using Node.js and React for a weekly online newsletter of 'The Hindu Education Plus Club VIT'. Automates the complete workflow from writing the article to reviewing and publishing it on the the website. Club members exclusive.

projects.title: IPL Chatbot with AWS Lex
projects.description: Created for VIT Hack 2020, the IPL Chatbot answers simple questions regarding IPL stats from 2017-2019. Powered by AWL Lex, Lambda and S3.

projects.title: Fraudulent Transaction Detection using Clonal Selection Algorithm (ML)
projects.description: Credit Card Fraud Transactions Classification using a hybrid AI-inspired AIS algorithm - CLONALG or Clonal Selection with KNN, that imparts adaptability /flexibility to the dataset based on incoming vectors so that the dataset stays relevant over time. Built the algorithm from ground up using Python 3.

projects.title: Modified Banker's Algorithm to Handle Interrupts
projects.description: Used POSIX Threads to create a multi-threaded model for queuing and handling interrupts within Banker's Algorithm. Logged Events on Console and CSV. The complete simulation was built from scratch in C using the pthreads library.

projects.title: Spinning Factory Production Report Generation with SQL
projects.description: Node Express application to log daily production data into a mySQL database and access it to generate reports.

projects.title: Factory Data Management Software using ELK Stack
projects.description: A Scalable Application for Management of a Spinning Mill with Elastic Search and Kibana for data visualisation and business intelligence. Incorporates NoSQL data and data pipelining.Node Express application to log daily production data into a mySQL database and access it to generate reports

projects.title: Clustering Publicly Available Pollution Data
projects.description: K-means Clustering Algorithm (Unsupervised Learning Alg) from scratch to cluster publicly available pollution data in https://data.gov.in/.
